ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I recommend the course to students who already have some knowledge about this topic. The course is highly specialized, so it is too tough for students without any knowledge about the topic to catch up with discussions.
Absolutely, and without reservations for those willing to put in the work.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It greatly broadened my historical view by providing me with a new historical perspective. Whatever history I focus on, this perspective will be one of the most useful tools to analyze it. In this sense, it contributed very much to my research both directly and indirectly.

Hard to say as I am only a first year. But surely it provided an occasion for thinking through (particularly in writing assignments) some of my own long-term research interests and potential approaches.
